wikipedia_page.main: John Emanuel (born 5 April 1948), is a former Wales international footballer. A midfielder, he began his career at Bristol City, also spending time on loan at Swindon Town and Gillingham. He joined Newport County in 1976 and made 79 Football League appearances for Newport, scoring 4 goals. In 1978, he joined Barry Town.Emanuel attained 2 caps for the Wales national football team.
